have you heard the story of Peter Pan
Peter Pan once upon a time in London
the darlings went out to a dinner party
leaving the three children Wendy John

after Wendy had tucked her younger

she went to read a book she heard a boy

hello who are you why are you crying
my name is pizza pan my shadow wouldn't
stick to me don't worry come inside
Peter
agreed

course get them we will all fly together

from now on
hello Wendy John and Michael
the few days passed and be settled into

she would cook for them and Stitch new

new dress for Tinkerbell one evening as
they were out exploring the island Peter
Pan warned everyone and said high tide
pirates and they've kidnapped the Indian

tied up by the rocks and here the water
Peter was afraid and the princess would

so in a voice that sounded like Captain
Hook he shouted instructions to the

let her go at once do it before I come

the Pirates got scared and immediately

soon everyone found out how Peter Pan

when Captain Hook found out how Peter

that night Wendy told Peter Pan that she

since they missed their parents
she said if the Lost Children could also
return to her world they could find nice

Lost Children

the next morning all the lost children
